# IJsonBoxClient.DeleteQueryAsync method

Deletes all records matching the queries.

```csharp
public Task<string> DeleteQueryAsync(params string[] queries)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| queries | The query items for filtering. See [Filtering](https://github.com/vasanthv/jsonbox#filtering) for details. |

## Return Value

A status message as a JSON object.
